price: Kama kutokota kwa maji ya moto.
footnotes: Utamu wake kama maadeni iliyo yayushwa kwa moto, inatokota matumboni kama yanavyo tokota maji yanayo chemshwa.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
